synopsis.text: Teppei Uesugi, raised in the wilderness by his father, is a spirited and unconventional teenager with a knack for causing mischief. Their life revolves around hunting for hidden treasures, leading Teppei to grow up with little exposure to society's norms. When his prestigious family background comes to light, Teppei is thrust into the unfamiliar world of high school and expected to adapt to a more conventional lifestyle. Despite his initial struggles with societal expectations, Teppei's natural athleticism and wild energy make him a standout in Kendo, earning him the admiration of his peers and transforming him into an unlikely school hero.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
